To find the lost phone easily
Record voice as password to find phone
Turn on the alert when someone touches\nyour phone
Turn on alerts when someone pulls your\nphone out of your pocket
Wishing you a great application experience
Clap to find phone is running
Touch Button Power to Stop Alarm
Double clap when you can’t find your phone
The app will detect the clapping sound and start ringing
Before activating, you can set the flashlight, adjust the volume and select alarm sound...
Create an audio passcode and save it
Double clap when you can’t find your phone
The app will detect the clapping sound and start ringing
The app will detect the sound passcode and start ringing
Before activating, you can set the flashlight, adjust the volume and select alarm sound...
Wait about 5 seconds to set the alarm
When someone touches your phone, the app detects and rings an alert
Put your phone in your pocket and make sure it is covered in your pocket
When someone pulls the phone out of your pocket, the app will detect and ring an alert
Make sure your phone is charging
When someone pulls the charger out of your phone, the app will detect it and ring an alert
Phone or Name can not be empty!
Do you like our application so far?\n
Let us know and help us improve the experience for users like you\n
You can try clapping your hands
The application has activated the clap listening mode
The application has enabled voice listening mode
Try taking your phone out of your pocket
The application has enabled pocket mode
The application has enabled charger alarm
You can try holding the phone
The application has enabled anti-touch mode
Watch a short video add to unlock Vibrate type
Watch a short video add to unlock Flash type
Become a VIP member to unlock all premium features
